name: Ensure at least two Okta admins are configured
body: While having too many administrators constitutes a security risk, having only one is also a risk especially when MFA is enforced. You should assign at least two Okta administrators for access redundancy.
remediationDescription: From the Okta Admin Dashboard, go to Security â†’ Administrators and press **+Add administrator**. You can read more about the various Okta administrator roles in the [Okta documentation](https://help.okta.com/en/prod/Content/Topics/Security/Administrators.htm).
